entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 17.

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 23 except minus 28 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 23 except minus 28 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023
